title: Contact Information
text:
Ani Hovhannisyan
anihovhannisyan303@gmail.com
The best way to contact me is at the email address above or through my LinkedIn profile, which I regularly update and check.
I am open to new job opportunities to gain more practice in the data science and machine learning.

title: Ani Hovhannisyan
text:
Hello! My name is Ani Hovhannisyan, and I am a Registration Manager at TUMO Berlin, Accenture GmbH. I coordinate and manage the entire registration process, ensuring efficient data entry, processing, and tracking through advanced Excel-based systems. My role also involves maintaining data quality through regular validation and providing customer support throughout the registration process.
I hold a Bachelor’s degree in International Business Administration with specializations in Information & Operation Management, Finance, and European Economics from the Europa-Universität Viadrina in Frankfurt (Oder), Germany. I am currently pursuing my Master’s degree in International Business Administration with a focus on Data Science & Decision Support (DSDS) at the same university.
Previously, I gained valuable experience as a coach at TUMO Berlin, where I mentored students in various digital disciplines such as programming, robotics, and graphic design. Additionally, I have practical experience in data management and analysis using TUMO Data Studio, and have contributed to the organization and management of special projects and events.
I also have international experience from my Erasmus exchange at NEOMA Business School in Reims, France, where I attended the corses: Data Analysis and Business Intelligence, Project Management and Globalization & Innovation.
You can find more information about my volunteer activities and Awards, on my Voluntary engagement & Awards page. For any inquiries, feel free to reach out to me via my contact information.
